allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete UI redesign with Munro and BPdots fonts, 25min Pomodoro timer, and enhanced UX

- Add Munro Small and BPdotsSquares fonts for retro pixel aesthetic
- Implement 25-minute Pomodoro countdown timer on home page with MM:SS display
- Add interactive circle with hover bob animation and RESET functionality
- Add tooltips on countdown circles showing remaining time (e.g., "4h 33min 5s")
- Implement clockwise countdown animation for all circles
- Add custom alert modals replacing browser alerts
- Add URL sharing and localStorage persistence for countdowns
- Improve mobile responsiveness with scaled input fields
- Add default "Counting down" title when no event name provided
- Optimize spacing and typography throughout the app
